summary: This is a Batch File, witch means you'll have to manually go in and put it into your data file.
descriptionHtml:
This is a Batch File, witch means you'll have to manually go in and put it into your data file.
There is one other thing you'll need to do before this will work, while your playing Skyrim hit
the (~) key and type this: bat skillperk. No Saces!!
author: GAIGEDUNN
